n: Carob Ice Cream - The Winning Try
des: "Carob-coconut ice cream is about the closest to a Wendy'sÂ® Frosty that I've been able to get. Serve immediately as soft serve or put in freezer to thicken. Shouldn't freeze solid, but remain scoopable."
ins:
Blend coconut milk, sugar, and carob powder together in a blender until smooth.
Pour coconut milk mixture into your ice cream maker and process according to manufacturer's instructions until smooth and frozen, about 45 minutes.
